website_summaries.verdict: The perfect kit for beginners. No need to roll the sushi!
pros: Handmade wooden construction for a designer look
Great for kids because of how easy it is to use
Clear step-by-step instructions and e-book with recipes are included
cons: Does not come with other accessories, like a rice spreader or knife

customer_reviews.title: If I can make Sushi, you can too!
customer_reviews.text: Proud to say I am progressing on my project to learn to make sushi at home. So, many beautiful, easy to use cookbooks out there now. There’s no excuse not to take the plunge from merely buying cookbooks (not judging!) to actually using them! There are lots of gadgets out there to help in creating exquisite sushi! This is a very sweet, well-made little gizmo that shapes the sushi rice so you can dust them with poppy seeds, or lay a very nice nice piece of fresh salmon across the top. It is attractively made from natural wood. Easy to use. Easy to clean. Rice doesn’t stick. Thanks to Amazon for books like: The Japanese Kitchen, Momofuko and Washoku.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use, too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Not clear which one you buy grande or mini. Mini does not have spatula included. I tried to make sushi with mini and it was sticking everywhere, it is so tiny, you can fit only thin slice of cucumber. Maybe grande version is better which I was hoping to get but as I wrote it was impossible to tell which one you buy from The description. I did one roll, and after took out my old bamboo may to finish making the rest of sushi. I can’t see any child be able to handle this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Nataliia C

customer_reviews.title: Not lowsy plastic
customer_reviews.text: Higher quality than the plastic ones. I got this as a gift because I love sushi. My dad makes it all the time and well now I have the ability to as well. I as really happy to get the bonus recipes because some of them my dad didn't even know how to make. This product is easy to use, quick to clean up and fun in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: jon smith

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: I could never make sushi. Always a disaster where it would fall apart. Then I came across this product. The photos show my first attempt and they turned out gorgeous. Super easy to do. Cleanup is a snap. The product is sturdy and it works!!
customer_reviews.author: JBMissouri

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy Sushi!
customer_reviews.text: 1st attempt was big failure because no store in my area here l in the hills of Southern Indiana sell Sushi rice & I used long grain rice .... which all fell off the pieces! I ordered Sushi rice on-line and do expect my next effort to be much better! The MAKIMAKER does a great job of compacting the ingredients and making a good roll. I recommend it .... with warning to only use "SUSHI RICE"! Also, I found an easier recipe on line for the Sushiza Sauce required to spice the rice.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again or recommend
customer_reviews.text: Extremely difficult to use as we tried to do this with our 9 year old. Also needs to be moistened with rice vinegar every step of the way and cleaned thoroughly between roll making otherwise you just have rice everywhere. I wouldn't recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit! Well my very first roll did not come out well that was because I didn't have sticky rice. The next three (using sticky rice) came out looking very professional and tasting wonderful! I also really appreciate the recipes the seller included in an email!
customer_reviews.author: AkitaResQ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 year old who loves sushi. This is a very well crafted and easy to use kit. We love it!!! Make sure you buy sushi rice to make it with, regular long grain rice doesnt stick together. I would buy another one to double production if it wasn't already out of stock! So much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Bmorina1

customer_reviews.title: All stuff no rolling
customer_reviews.text: We love sushi and these made it fun for us to make our own at home for muchhhh cheaper. There are other sushi makers that are awesome and work just as great but this one is nice because there is no rolling. It’s all about stuffing (which is much easy for us). 3 starts for “easy to clean” because nothing is easy to clean with sticky rice.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Easy
customer_reviews.text: I used this kit to make sushi for the first time. It turned out great! The instructions are easy to follow, but it also helped to watch some videos prior to using it. It didn't take long to get the hang of it, and it was fun to use. The most important step is to soak the Maki Maker in cold water first to prevent the rice from sticking to it. The Maki Maker is well made and seems like it will last for a long time. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift. So it hasn’t been used as of yet. It was highly recommended by other buyers, came quickly, looks exactly like stated in the product review. It comes with a downloadable recipe book. Now that I did look at closely. Easy to read, seemed thorough. My grandkids will love it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Great sushi maker - looking for the recipe book??
customer_reviews.text: Just got turned onto Sushi and this kit is great! Very easy, simple - anyone can do it!! Someone in an earlier review mentioned an electronic recipe book ... nothing came with mine. I am very interested in getting access to this as this is one of the reasons why I purchased this kit over the many others out there. Anyway, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun to use when my nieces and nephews ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy and fun to use when my nieces and nephews want to learn to "cook". It almost as popular as pizza night.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Cutler

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as part of a Christmas gift for my brother and sister-in-law - when it arrived I was sorely disappointed. It's in a cheap plastic box and looks like something you'd see on an "As Seen on TV" shelf in Bed Bath & Beyond. It definitely does not look like it's worth the $40 I paid for it and nothing like the pictures provided on here. I will be returning this and looking for a new gift for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Culver

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and son in law love this. They found it very easy to use and the sushi looks really good when they are done. They are having fun with it and it arrived promptly
customer_reviews.author: chicamom85

customer_reviews.title: Sushi made easier
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! Makes making sushi so much easier. Super easy to clean and quick to clean. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It included directions and ideas that are easy to understand and exciting to try
customer_reviews.text: I am not a sushi person, but I bought this for my daughter for Christmas and she loves it. I was especially impressed with the free guide that was emailed over from the seller. It included directions and ideas that are easy to understand and exciting to try.
customer_reviews.author: A. L. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Cool product
customer_reviews.text: We used it once for the first time and sushi came out looking pretty good! Good quality wooden frame. Came with directions for use and recipe ideas. Also got a link sent to me after I purchased for additional info, but haven’t looked into that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This has made sushi making an absolute breeze and so much more affordable to make at home! Even my 5 & 8 year old girls love to be involved so it becomes a real family dinner session:) This is beautifully made and easier than using the roll mats as a beginner- thank-you!!
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Practical, great quality, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to use, improved my rolls so much, and the recipes are delitious.

customer_reviews.title: Need to keep moist to prevent sticking
customer_reviews.text: New to making my own sushi and this is a good starter tool

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used the kit my technique wasn’t very good but it had nothing to do with the product. The second was really great. This kit is quality. The small instruction sheet and the few recipes on the second card were enough to get me started. I would recommend this kit. I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: Good price, good quality, delivered as promised. I used this for the first time last night. Very easy to use. Sushi came out great for me and my guests. Definitely would recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is enjoying this--sushi is her favorite food. This maki maker is so much easier than rolling, so dinner is easier and faster.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our sushi-loving 9yr old to make CA rolls. It is easy to learn how to use and has been a great memory maker and tummy filler.

customer_reviews.title: Looks to be perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 11 year old son for Christmas. He has not received it yet, but I am sure that he will LOVE it!! It looks like it will be very easy to use. I am excited for him to get it so we can dive in and make some sushi. Also, The shipping was extremely fast!!

customer_reviews.title: makes it so easy to make sushi compare to the bamboo roller
customer_reviews.text: I have made sushi numerous time using a bamboo roller so the edges are always not smooth. But this kit makes my sushi looks professional. Also, makes it so easy to make sushi compare to the bamboo roller. I can also now experiment with different types of sushi.

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised how fine this sushi-maker is
customer_reviews.text: Well, this sushi maker is one of the most interesting purchase I’ve made on Amazon this year. I like it made of wood, but not plastic. 5 stars, of course. I’m very exited, I’ve learned sushi making process. I want to share with you my video about my first time cooking sushi experience.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Bright

customer_reviews.title: This is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: First, I have to say that I have NEVER attempted sushi. I LOVE sushi, but it looked to be very time consuming and had to made professionally. I was wrong...VERY wrong. This kit (love the wood) is virtually fool proof and creates delightful/artistic results. I really can not praise this product enough...and I am not the type of person to rate something 5 stars if not deserved. This product I would rate 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Battaglia

customer_reviews.title: Best device for any beginner
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to make vegetarian sushi with a friend but didn’t really know how to do it. We check amazon and found this and it ended up being perfect. It came with an ebook that was so helpful with ingredient and it had recipes! I love the square sushi pieces. It’s so cute. And it’s such an easy sushi device to use. I’ve tried a couple others that have you roll the sushi and they always fall apart. This has been the best I’ve used and I can’t wait to use it more! Favorite combo was avocado, cucumber, red bell pepper, carrots, lettuce, rolled with sushi and nori, with a sprinkle of paprika! Square an yum!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter and her husband. They loved, loved, loved it! The end result was restaurant quality. I enclosed a picture that they sent me. Very impressive! I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: Does pretty good, most of the time my seaweed stuck ...
customer_reviews.text: Does pretty good, most of the time my seaweed stuck to the part you press down with so not sure why. Need to try again and may change star rating to a 4
customer_reviews.author: Paul G.

customer_reviews.title: This Maki Maker is brilliant though! my first time making sushi ever
customer_reviews.text: i must confess i wasnt sure at first, as i am new to making sushi rolls, and i was under the impression it was all about the rolling mats. This Maki Maker is brilliant though! my first time making sushi ever, and even i got some really good maki first time! Even when it turned up, i will confess to being a little underwhelmed by this little wooden block. IT IS PERFECT! the right size, the beguilingly simple tool is exactly what is needed. top it off with clear instructions, and a free rolls recipe book, and this is ideal for both the beginner, and the more experienced too.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Irvine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe I made sushi on my first go! The Grand Maki Maker made this possible. User friendly and zero mess. I will definitely be making more sushi.....Confidently! 😁 Check out my vid....🤗
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: It isn’t a bad product it’s just that my wife and I found it easier to make sushi with a regular bamboo mat which is much cheaper than this is. Would recommend not buying any of the sushi making gadgets.

customer_reviews.title: ... it twice this week and my rolls turned out fine. my only concern is keeping it properly cleaned ...
customer_reviews.text: i've used it twice this week and my rolls turned out fine. my only concern is keeping it properly cleaned and that the wood doesn't warp or whatever. we'll see how thing products lasts in the next few months.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, HOLY IRRITATING SPAM
customer_reviews.text: So I actually liked the product a lot. We used it the other day to make sushi to great success. I don't appreciate being emailed and constantly reminded to download their book and leave a review. I shop online so I don't have to interact with people.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Demand a printed copy of the "cookbook" before you order this.
customer_reviews.text: The sushi "cookbook" is an MP3 that cannot be downloaded. I have tried on my phone, my kindle, and 3 different computers. The sushi kit itself seems to be good quality, but because I can't get the book, I'm not getting everything I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: D Mar

customer_reviews.title: Makes sushi making a lot faster
customer_reviews.text: I am used to making sushi the traditional way, but this thing really does speed up my process, and that all good with me. i purchased the mini maki maker, and I'm going to order the regular sized one.

customer_reviews.title: Gift item

customer_reviews.title: An excellent choice

The Makimaker itself has an appealing design and is worthy of being a gift, and the supplied recipe book does not only provide good ideas and instructions but also many useful tips.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Houston

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Product is easy to use. I learned to roll makizushi traditionally using a makisu so this kit makes rolling sushi a whole lot easier. Product is well constructed, and even comes with recipes. The kit produces bite sized makizushi -- about 1.25 in to 1.5 in. in diameter. Very pleased with this purchase. Makes for a great gift for a sushi lover.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect norimaki every time!
customer_reviews.text: Works just a described. I make norimaki now for my sons lunch box once a week, and he loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.text: Theres nothing wrong with the quality of this product. Its just a lot smaller than we anticipated. We wanted to make Spam Musubi and we ended up cutting them in half to fit inside the maker.

product_meta.title: Sushi Making Kit by iSottcom - Sushi Kit for Chef and Beginners - Sushi Maker Your Best Professional Quick Sushi Making Set - Japanese Sushi and Rolls at Home with Easy Sushi Press - Makimaker Grand
feature_bullets: 🍣 EASY TO USE - No rolling required, our complete kit is the easiest way to make homemade sushi. Even a beginner will be able to make rolls. Use this set with your children for a sushi party

🎁 AN EXCELLENT GIFT IDEA - Unlike sushi making kits made of cheap plastic, our wooden mold is a great way to present something special to friends and loved ones. It is a compact, unusual, and useful gift

📱 SPECIAL MOBILE RECIPE APP - Our app features Japanese roll recipes, clear step by step instructions, and a calculator for ANDROID and IOS. We also offer a downloadable sushi recipe eBook at our website
🤲 MASTERFULLY HANDCRAFTED - Our special sushi making kits are ecological products, having been made of high-quality natural material. Our amazing molding set is crafted entirely by hand
🤝 100% MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE - Our products undergo special manual processing, to ensure that our Sushi kit will serve you for years. We provide our customers with a lifetime warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars301 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
